quote: I can't tell you how may beautiful women have broken up with me because they were bored. I can't tell you because it never happened. They all adored me."" ""It was your humility, wasn't it?
quote_letters: I CANT TELL YOU HOW MAY BEAUTIFUL WOMEN HAVE BROKEN UP WITH ME BECAUSE THEY WERE BORED I CANT TELL YOU BECAUSE IT NEVER HAPPENED THEY ALL ADORED ME IT WAS YOUR HUMILITY WASNT IT
